articles.author: Avery Lotz, Philip Wang
articles.title: Trump signs executive order targeting American flag burning - Axios
articles.description: The Supreme Court ruled in 1989 that flag burning constitutes protected symbolic speech.
articles.content:
• Those could include violent crimes, crimes against property, illegal discrimination and other violations, per the order.
Driving the news: "If you burn a flag, you get one year in ja… [+4067 chars]
